name: Mean Klean™ Concrete Cleaner
description: Mean Klean™ Concrete Cleaner is a high-quality, multi-purpose cleaner and light degreaser that is generally used following applications of Mean Klean™ Concrete Cleaner. This concentrated cleaner can be diluted with water to provide an economical, effective cleaner for a variety of surfaces ranging from concrete to laundry. NewLook Concrete Cleaner quickly removes grease, oil, adhesive, dirt, food, soot, and more. It contains a powerful natural vegetable source solvent that is safe and bio-degradable. NewLook Concrete Cleaner effectively cleans concrete surfaces stained with NewLook Concrete Color Stains
